title: Linking natural capital stocks with ecosystem services in the Northern Baltic Sea
content:
Publication date: February 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 65

Author(s): Susanna Jernberg, Harri Kuosa, Christoffer Boström, Daryl Burdon, Fiia Haavisto, Anna-Stiina Heiskanen, Suvi Kiviluoto, Sanna Kuningas, Mervi Kunnasranta, Laura Uusitalo, Anna Villnäs, Mats Westerbom, Kirsi Kostamo
